unnormalised: **New Wheels Alert! A Week of Vehicle Launches!**

unnormalised: Folks, if youâ€™re car shopping, hold onto your turbans! This week has been a total *dhamaka* in the automotive world. Tata launched the souped-up Nexon EV Max in a vibrant 'Intensi-Teal' shade - perfect for cruising down Marine Drive.
normalised: Folks, if you are car shopping, hold onto your turbans! This week has been a total *dhamaka* in the automotive world. Tata launched the souped-up Nexon E V Max in a vibrant 'Intensi-Teal' shade - perfect for cruising down Marine Drive.

unnormalised: Mahindra unveiled teaser pics of the Scorpio-N Adventure edition hinting at some serious off-roading capabilities - think Leh-Ladakh ready. Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi, a leading voice in automotive tech, commented on the growing trend of ADAS features in even budget cars.

unnormalised: Maruti Suzuki also dropped a bomb by teasing the new-gen Alto 800. Expect it to be more fuel-efficient than ever, perfect for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams.
normalised: Maruti Suzuki also dropped a bomb by teasing the new-gen Alto eight hundred. Expect it to be more fuel-efficient than ever, perfect for navigating those crazy Bangalore traffic jams.

unnormalised: Plus, a local garage in Faridabad showcased a stunning modified Gypsy with a massive 300 sq ft rooftop tent! Rumours are flying about the on-road price of the Nexon EV Max, allegedly starting around Rs. 18 Lakh. More details are awaited! This is like Diwali for car lovers!
